attributes.action: Do not implement the Sugary Drinks Refill Policy
attributes.additional_details: To either scrap the idea as a whole or perhaps implement it in a different way, as it can be easily flawed.
attributes.background:
The government has recently announced a ban on restaurants from serving bottomless sugary drinks in their menu e.g. Nando’s.

“To protect children’s diets”, when they could easily go into the nearest shop and buy an unlimited amount of sugary drinks. This ban would not benefit the UK at all.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Revoke regulations that restrict promotion of high sugar/fat food and drink
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745031
